chart_description: This chart provides the status of machine learning on the monitored system. It tracks the status of disabled and enabled SP (Static Prediction) and UE (User-defined Events). If SP and UE are both disabled, then Machine Learning is not enabled on the monitored system.

dimension_descriptions.disabled-sp: The number of disabled Static Prediction rules.
dimension_descriptions.disabled-ue: The number of disabled User-defined Events that are used in Machine Learning.
dimension_descriptions.enabled: The number of enabled Machine Learning algorithms on the system. A value of '0' indicates that Machine Learning is not enabled.
